name: tonejs-mml-to-json
description: MML to JSON converter for tonejs-json-sequencer

scripts.test:wasm: node test/wasm-test.mjs && node test/wasm-integration-test.mjs && node test/demo-test.mjs && node test/wasm-init-test.mjs
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:wasm
scripts.dev: pnpm run build:parser && pnpm run test:watch
